channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Fool (Neutral Evil)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: Prankster [Passive] target a player: target player laughs too much they forget to do their day ability
Night Ability 1: Laughter Of Death Choose a Target: Target Player Misses their night ability and dies can only be done three times:
Lore: The Fool was once a criminal mercilessly killing everyone who got in his way, now sentenced to be a fool for the kings amusement hes plotting a scheme to get his revenge
Comments: Win conditions: The Fool wins if the king is killed at any point in the game
Hey Everyone, sorry for the mess of a suggestion i haft to work on the lore just a bit, this is just an idea and i need to work on it so i might change this character a bit here and there.I will take suggestions: Please note:(the fool can't kill the king himself) after reading alot more of the forums the fool only needs the 1st king dead
Until next time <3

a suggestion to change it up a bit. we change the name since the fool is already taken

The Masquerade(Neutral Evil

Night Ability 1: Mask Of deception

Win conditions: Kill the current king by getting everyone to vote him(because if he can any time that’s too easy gotta make it harder then that

"Surprise Mojo": The Fool can secretly replace a target player’s Night Ability with fireworks which occupies them and also cancels the target player’s immune during the night.
